install.name: FLEXIcontent - Group Marker
install.author: ggppdk
install.description: FLEXIcontent Group Marker. This field is used to mark the start/end of FLEXIcontent field groups in ITEM edit FORM. Group will appear inside Tabs/Fieldsets/etc. Take care to match all opennings with a closing marker appropriately.

param.name: marker_type
param.label: Marker type
param.description: BE CAREFULL to match-close all open type of markers with an appropriate closing type. BE CAREFULL to which content types you assign the field to.

param.name: cont_label
param.label: Tab/Fieldset Label
param.description: Label of tab / fieldset / etc, only appropriate 'opening' markers

param.name: cont_cssclass
param.label: Container CSS class
param.description: CSS class of tab / fieldset / etc inner container, only appropriate 'opening' markers

param.name: custom_html_sep
param.label: Custom HTML
param.description: Enter the custom HTML code that will be placed between the fields
